name: Pest Control (itch) (Toadboyf)
description:
Short Demo for MyFirstGameJam.

Pest Control is a fast paced 90's inspired FPS where you wake up in a hostile lab environment and have to fight to make your way out alive... and change in unexpected ways throughout the complex. 

W-A-S-D                  Move

Space                          Jump

F                                   Interact

LeftCtrl                    Crouch

LeftShift                  Sprint

LeftMouse             Punch/Shoot

T                                  Pause

This is my first demo project! Please let me know what you think.

Thanks for playing! :-)
